title: The Windy Hill
description: Newbery Medal Honor Title (1922)A brother and sister visit their older cousin in New England. Their cousin was once jovial,, but is now mysteriously irritable and preoccupied. A chance meeting with the beeman leads to their hearing stories about their own familyâ€™s history. As they listen, the two children start to understand the cause of their cousins anxiety.
author: Cornelia Meigs
